column4: Anybody knows why my TimeZone got changed out of the blue, I am in  Bangladesh (+6/+7), it was +7 till yesterday and today after tzdata package was updated it is +6 :(, any body knows how I can revert back? I missed a meeting for this :( (rerun)
Just set the time to one hour back. Not a major problem.
not so simple as I also have to check times of other places :(
